properties.entry: SELECT CITY_NAME, CITY_NO, NATION_NAME FROM TB_NATION JOIN TB_CITY USING(NATION_NO) ORDER BY NATION_NAME

SELECT REVIEW_NO, REVIEW_TITLE, NICKNAME, CREATE_DATE, FILE_PATH|| '/' || CHANGE_NAME TITLE_IMG FROM TB_REVIEW JOIN MEMBER ON(REVIEW_WRITER = MEM_NO) JOIN TB_FILE ON(REVIEW_NO = BOARD_NO) WHERE TB_REVIEW.STATUS = 'Y' AND FILE_LEVEL = 1 ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC

SELECT REVIEW_NO, REVIEW_TITLE, REVIEW_CONTENT, NICKNAME, CREATE_DATE, LIKES, FILE_PATH|| '/' || CHANGE_NAME TITLE_IMG FROM TB_REVIEW JOIN MEMBER ON(REVIEW_WRITER = MEM_NO) JOIN (SELECT COUNT(*)-1 LIKES, BOARD_TYPE, BOARD_NO FROM TB_LIKE GROUP BY BOARD_TYPE, BOARD_NO) ON(REVIEW_NO = BOARD_NO) JOIN TB_FILE ON(REVIEW_NO = TB_FILE.BOARD_NO) WHERE TB_FILE.BOARD_TYPE = 6 AND TB_REVIEW.STATUS = 'Y' AND FILE_LEVEL = 1 ORDER BY LIKES DESC
UPDATE TB_REVIEW SET COUNT = COUNT + 1 WHERE REVIEW_NO = ?

SELECT REVIEW_NO, REVIEW_TITLE, REVIEW_CONTENT, NICKNAME, DEPARTURE_DATE, ARRIVAL_DATE, PARTNER, STAR_POINT, CREATE_DATE, CITY_NAME, NATION_NAME, PLAN_CHECK, TB_REVIEW.COUNT, LIKES FROM TB_REVIEW JOIN MEMBER ON(REVIEW_WRITER = MEM_NO) JOIN TB_CITY USING(CITY_NO) JOIN TB_NATION USING(NATION_NO) JOIN (SELECT COUNT(*)-1 AS LIKES, BOARD_NO, BOARD_TYPE FROM TB_LIKE GROUP BY BOARD_NO, BOARD_TYPE) ON(REVIEW_NO = BOARD_NO) WHERE BOARD_TYPE = 6 AND TB_REVIEW.STATUS = 'Y' AND REVIEW_NO = ? ORDER BY LIKES DESC
SELECT REVIEW_NO, TAG_NUM, TAG_NAME FROM BRTB_TAG JOIN TB_REVIEW USING(REVIEW_NO) JOIN TB_HASHTAG USING(TAG_NUM) WHERE REVIEW_NO = ?
SELECT R.REVIEW_NO, R.REVIEW_TITLE, C.CITY_NAME, R.CREATE_DATE, R.STATUS FROM ASIHANA.TB_REVIEW R JOIN ASIHANA.TB_CITY C ON R.CITY_NO = C.CITY_NO WHERE R.REVIEW_WRITER = ? ORDER BY R.CREATE_DATE

SELECT R.REVIEW_NO, R.REVIEW_TITLE, C.CITY_NAME, R.DEPARTURE_DATE, R.COUNT, M.NICKNAME FROM ASIHANA.TB_REVIEW R JOIN ASIHANA.TB_CITY C ON R.CITY_NO = C.CITY_NO JOIN ASIHANA.MEMBER M ON R.REVIEW_WRITER = M.MEM_NO WHERE R.REVIEW_WRITER = ? AND R.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY R.DEPARTURE_DATE
SELECT REVIEW_NO, TAG_NUM, TAG_NAME FROM BRTB_TAG JOIN TB_REVIEW USING(REVIEW_NO) JOIN TB_HASHTAG USING(TAG_NUM) ORDER BY REVIEW_NO

INSERT INTO TB_REVIEW ( REVIEW_NO, REVIEW_TITLE, REVIEW_CONTENT, REVIEW_WRITER, DEPARTURE_DATE, ARRIVAL_DATE, PARTNER, STAR_POINT, CITY_NO, PLAN_CHECK ) VALUES ( SEQ_REVIEW.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ? )
INSERT INTO BRTB_TAG ( TAG_NUM, REVIEW_NO ) VALUES ( ?, SEQ_REVIEW.CURRVAL )
INSERT INTO TB_FILE ( FILE_NO, BOARD_NO, FILE_PATH, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, BOARD_TYPE, FILE_LEVEL ) VALUES ( SEQ_FILE.NEXTVAL, SEQ_REVIEW.CURRVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?, ? )
INSERT INTO TB_LIKE ( LIKE_NO, MEM_NO, BOARD_TYPE, BOARD_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_LIKE.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, SEQ_REVIEW.CURRVAL )

SELECT NATION_NAME, CITY_NO, CITY_NAME, CITY_CONTENT, LANGUAGE_NAME, CURRENCY_NAME, VOL_NAME, VISA_NAME, FILE_PATH, CHANGE_NAME, BOARD_TYPE FROM (SELECT NATION_NAME, CITY_NO, CITY_NAME, CITY_CONTENT, LANGUAGE_NAME, CURRENCY_NAME, VOL_NAME, VISA_NAME FROM TB_NATION N JOIN TB_CITY C ON (N.NATION_NO = C.NATION_NO) JOIN BRTB_LANG BL ON (BL.NATION_NO = N.NATION_NO) JOIN TB_LANGUAGE L ON (L.LANGUAGE_NO = BL.LANGUAGE_NO) JOIN BRTB_CURRENCY BC ON (BC.NATION_NO = N.NATION_NO) JOIN TB_CURRENCY C ON (BC.CURRENCY_NO = C.CURRENCY_NO) JOIN BRTB_VOL BV ON (BV.NATION_NO = N.NATION_NO) JOIN TB_VOLTAGE V ON (BV.VOL_NO = V.VOL_NO) JOIN BRTB_VISA BS ON (BS.NATION_NO = N.NATION_NO) JOIN TB_VISA S ON (BS.VISA_NO = S.VISA_NO)) A JOIN TB_FILE ON (A.CITY_NO = TB_FILE.BOARD_NO) WHERE BOARD_TYPE = ? AND CITY_NO = ?
SELECT FILE_PATH || '/' || CHANGE_NAME PATH, FILE_LEVEL FROM TB_FILE WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND BOARD_TYPE = 6 ORDER BY FILE_LEVEL
SELECT CITY_NO FROM TB_CITY WHERE CITY_NAME = ?
